member.name: M:TraceLogsClassLibrary.TraceLog.#ctor(System.String)
member.param: Absolute path of the TraceLog folder

member.name: M:TraceLogsClassLibrary.TraceLog.WriteEventLogEntry(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Writes a log entry for an event/action.
member.param: Name of the method from which the event was fired (function/subroutine)
Comments (generally used to give reason if the event/action fails)
Username as stored in the UMS

member.name: M:TraceLogsClassLibrary.TraceLog.WriteErrorLogEntry(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Writes a log entry for system errors/exceptions.
member.param: Name of the method from which the event was fired (function/subroutine)
Username as stored in the UMS
